mapper.insert: insert into music (name, album_id, singer_id, album_name, singer_name, audio, count, sort, lyric, create_time, status, release_time) VALUES (#{name},#{albumId},#{singerId},#{albumName},#{singerName},#{audio},#{count},#{sort},#{lyric},#{createTime}, #{status},#{releaseTime})
mapper.select:
select id, name, album_id, singer_id, album_name, singer_name, audio, count, sort, lyric, create_time, status, release_time from music
name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and album_name like concat('%',#{albumName},'%')
and singer_name like concat('%',#{singerName},'%')
and status = #{status}
mapper.update:
update music
id = #{id},
name = #{name},
album_id = #{albumId},
singer_id = #{singerId},
album_name = #{albumName},
singer_name = #{singerName},
audio = #{audio},
count = #{count},
sort = #{sort},
release_time = #{releaseTime},
status = #{status}
where id = #{id}
